rows.label: qst702701_msg0001
rows.name:
You're Drivers, right?
You've come at a good time!

rows.label: qst702701_msg0002
rows.name:
There was a bridge on the way
here, right? I want to go to the
Haradd Hills beyond it, but...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0003
rows.name:
Unfortunately, a monster
has taken up residence,
and I'm in a real bind.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0005
rows.name:
Sand with that color and composition
can only be found there.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0006
rows.name:
If the delivery is late, who
knows how many punches I'll
get from my old man...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0007
rows.name:
...Anyway, please. I'll be waiting
at the camp in Felt Village.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0101
rows.name: He just said his piece and left...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0103
rows.name:
I certainly want to prioritize
meeting Laura's mother.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0104
rows.name:
But I can't bring myself to
abandon someone in need...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0105
rows.name:
And if we help him, he
might help us someday.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0110
rows.name: Thank you. I'll think about it.
